title: Foreign Investment to Boost Irish Growth, Central Bank Forecasts
description: The Central Bank of Ireland revised up its domestic growth forecast due to a stronger outlook for multinational investment.
content: The Central Bank of Ireland revised up its domestic growth forecast due to a stronger outlook for multinational investment.
